title: Life's Abundance Deploys DH2i Container Management Software to Manage Microsoft SQL Server Environment
text:
DH2i
Leading Provider of Natural Pet and People Products Deploys DxEnterprise to Modernize Backend Accounting and Frontend Fulfillment Systems, Ensure High Availability (HA), and Position for Future Move to Integrated Disaster Recovery (DR)
FORT COLLINS, Colo. , Oct. 20, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- DH2i ™ Company, recently named a Cool Vendor by Gartner in the "Cool Vendors in Servers and Virtualization, 2015 1 " report, today announced that Life's Abundance , Inc., has deployed its DxEnterprise ™ container management software to modernize its backend accounting and frontend order fulfillment systems. In addition, Life's Abundance will utilize DxEnterprise to ensure data high availability (HA), as well as a seamless future move to integrated disaster recovery (DR).
Since its founding in 1998, Life's Abundance has enjoyed phenomenal success across all of its premium product lines, featuring all-natural foods, treats and supplements for dogs and cats, as well as ultra-pure fish oil supplements for human consumption. With this success has come exponential growth in its family of independent distributors as well. Not surprisingly, this led to growing pains across its backend and frontend infrastructures. In addition to addressing its backend accounting and frontend fulfillment systems, it needed a solution for the network of individual websites it provides to each of its independent distributors that had become unruly to manage. Its IT environment included frontend applications that were virtualized on Hyper-V, and a backend environment that included a Microsoft Windows Server 2003 and Microsoft SQL Server 2005 physical deployment cluster. Among its primary IT challenges were how to most effectively manage its Microsoft Windows application environment, how to avoid SQL Server sprawl and its associated problems, and how best to address Microsoft Windows Server 2003 and Microsoft SQL Server 2005 being end-of-lifed (EOL). An upgrade was required and Life's Abundance wanted better resilience in the process. It considered SQL Server Enterprise Edition for its multi-node HA clusters but the price for what it needed was astounding.
"We looked at the upgrades that Microsoft was recommending, and evaluated SQL Server Enterprise Edition," said Charlie Scherker , IT Director, Life's Abundance. "However, it was frustrating to learn that in order to obtain the level of resiliency we required for our multi-node cluster, we would be forced to purchase a suite of features for which we had no use. For us, that just didn't seem like a great business decision. Ultimately, we chose to deploy SQL Server Standard Edition along with DxEnterprise to give us the multi-node HA clusters we needed at a price we liked."
DH2i's DxTransfer ™ free SQL Server migration tool was then utilized to seamlessly migrate the organization's SQL Server instance data into DxEnterprise.
"DH2i's DxTransfer delivered a uniform and consistent deployment of our SQL instances during the migration. Our corporate standards were maintained. And we are now well positioned for fast and easy migrations as needed, in the future," said Scherker. "We no longer dread the possibility of SQL Server sprawl, associated management complexity and budget-busting license costs. DxEnterprise management is really so straightforward – making it easy to manage and ensure the high availability of our entire environment – from our backend to our frontend systems, to our network of independent distributor websites."
"With DxEnterprise, Life's Abundance will be able to 'containerize' its Windows Server application instances, thereby decoupling the apps and all associated data from host OS and underlying infrastructure. In this way, they will then be able to achieve fast and transparent application portability, hyperscale cloud-like agility, ensured HA, and integrated DR," said Don Boxley , CEO and Co-Founder, DH2i . "Of course, the fact that the organization's associated costs will likely decrease by 30-60% is also a bonus."

About DH2i
DH2i Company ™ is the leading provider of Microsoft Windows Server application portability and management solutions. Its newly launched flagship solution, DxEnterprise™, containerizes and decouples Microsoft Windows Server applications and data from the host OS and underlying IT infrastructure. This decoupling provides users with the ability to move their traditional enterprise applications such as SQL Server or new multi-container-based applications with data from any host, to any host, anywhere with near-zero downtime maintaining a consistent application connection endpoint. In doing so, customers are able to better consolidate their environment, build and manage hybrid physical, virtual and/or cloud environments, dramatically simplify management, and ensure service level agreements (SLAs). The bottom line for customers equals a 30%-70% reduction in software and related infrastructure costs, ensured application availability, and a 70%+ increase in application management productivity. DH2i is included in the list of Cool Vendors in the " Cool Vendors in Servers and Virtualization, 2015 1 " report by Gartner, Inc.
